system.effect: Kroot prefer light armour. If they wear armour that provides more than 3 AP, they lose the benefit of Unnatural Perception (if they have it) and Fieldcraft Traits.

description.value: Kroot prefer light armour. If they wear armour that provides more than 3 AP, they lose the benefit of Unnatural Perception (if they have it) and Fieldcraft Traits.
